title: Nigel Farage: 'Only an election can solve Brexit impasse'
text:
Nigel Farage responded to Saturday’s “shenanigans” in Parliament by insisting the time has come for a general election.

The Brexit Party leader said MPs had shown they wanted to delay Brexit, adding that their ultimate goal was a second referendum, meaning it was time for the public to shake up the Commons.

He told LBC Radio: “The public will just see more parliamentary shenanigans, more delay, more attempts to stop Brexit. That's what the public will see.

"And of course, the truth of it is this is all about getting a second referendum. That is what the Remainer forces in Parliament want. And the more time they buy, the more chance they've got of getting something like that passed.

"So you know,...
description: Nigel Farage responded to Saturday’s “shenanigans” in Parliament by insisting the time has come for a general election.
